title: 85% of Indian respondents agree that the global economy will be stronger in 2024 than in 2023
selftext: According to Visual Capitalist, as of March 2024, India, China, and Indonesia are the most confident about the global economy's prospects in 2024.
comments:
Yes. Let’s run economy on opinion polls. /s

At best this is indication of consumer confidence. So still a good news but just one component of economic outlook.
"Opinions of 100,000 men have no meaning if none of them know anything about the subject"
